name: In Cage
description:
An investigator is sent to control a new hen farm but he has mysteriously disappeared ...

  You will play Kelly, a new investigator who still to prove she is good. You will quickly realize that this is not an ordinary investigation ...



  This game was created to fight against the intensive breeding of animals in cages. Indeed, more than 300 million living animals don't even leave their cage. Which is not acceptable.
